title: the powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities 

(Vegetable Seeds) (Amendment) (No. 3) Regulations 2020.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european community (vegetable seeds) (amendment) (no 3) regulation 2020

title: the powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act
heading: 2. The European Communities (Vegetable Seeds) Regulations 2001 (S.I.
text_raw:
2. The European Communities (Vegetable Seeds) Regulations 2001 (S.I. 
No. 306 of 2001) are amended by substituting in Regulation 2(1) for the 
definition of “Directive” (as amended by the European Communities 
(Vegetable Seeds) (Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 160 of 
2020)) the following: 

“‘Directive’ means Council Directive 2002/55/EC of 13 June 20022, 
Council Directive 2003/61/EC of 18 June 20033, Regulation (EC) No 
1829/2003 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 22 
September 20034, Council Directive 2004/117/EC of 22 December 
20045, Commission Directive 2016/124/EC of 5 December 20066, 
Commission Directive 2009/74/EC of 26 June 20097, Commission 
Implementing Directive 2013/45/EU of 7 August 20138, Commission 
Implementing Directive (EU) 2016/317 of 3 March 20169, Commission 
Implementing Directive (EU) 2020/432 of 23 March 202010 and 
Commission Implementing Directive (EU) 2020/177 of 11 February 
2020 ;”. 

1 OJ L 41, 13.02.2020, P.1 
2 OJ L 193, 20.07.2002, P.33 
3 OJ L 165, 03.07.2003, P. 23 
4 OJ L 268, 18.10.2003, P.1 
5 OJ L14, 18.01.2005, P. 18 
6 OJ L 339, 06.12.2006, P.12 
7 OJ L 166, 27.06.2009, P.40 
8 OJ L 213, 08.08.2013, P.20 
9 OJ L 60, 05.03.2016, P72 
10 OJ L 88, 24.03.2020 P.3 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 9th June, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3. The European Communities (Vegetable Seeds) (Amendment) (No.2) 

Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 160 of 2020) are revoked. 

[202] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 May, 2020. 

MICHAEL CREED, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [202]

title: the powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations give effect to the provisions of Commission Implementing 
Directive (EU) 2020/177 by amending the Annexes I and II to Directive 
2002/55/EC as they relate to inspections for Union regulated non-quarantine 
pests (RNQPs) and measures intended to prevent their presence on vegetable 
seeds for planting. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [202] 5
